SqlVectorFloat32.summary: Represents the vector of float datatype in SQL Server.

ctor1.summary: Takes a as input and represents null value for vector column of float element type.

ctor2.summary: Takes an array of float values as input and initializes a new instance of the SqlVectorFloat32 class.

ElementCount.summary: Indicates the count of the elements in the float vector.

ToArray.summary: Returns the internal float array representing the float vector.

ToString.summary: Returns a JSON string representing the internal float array representing the float vector.
